participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and independent, Emily enjoys expressing herself through her art and values her freedom.
participant_1.background: I feel the most confident when I'm wearing makeup and listening to Charlie Daniels. I can remember listening to my parents' Beatles record over and over again. I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art. My parents both are school teachers. I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Supportive and outgoing, Jason loves to engage with creative pursuits and values family connections.
participant_2.background: My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative every day. I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend. My hair is very long. I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours. I love hiking and staying fit.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Good! How about yours?
Pretty good! I'm just hanging out, listening to music, and drawing.
That sounds fun! What kind of music are you listening to?
I'm listening to some Charlie Daniels. He's my favorite.
Oh cool! I've never heard of him before. What kind of music does he play?
He's a country singer. He's kind of old-school, but I really like his music.
Oh, I like country music! I'll have to check him out.
You should! I think you'll like him.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an artist. I draw and paint.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be an artist.
It's a lot of fun! But it's also a lot of work.
I can imagine. But it must be so rewarding to see your work come to life.
It is! It's the best feeling in the world.
I'm so glad you're enjoying your work.
Thanks! I am.
So, what's your favorite thing to draw or paint?
I like to draw people. I also like to paint landscapes.
Those are both really cool things to draw and paint!
Thanks! I love doing them.
So, do you have any of your work online?
I do! I have a website where I sell my art.
Oh, that's awesome! I'll have to check it out.
You should! I'd love to know what you think.
I definitely will
